quoteDoc: Grand jury subpoena for Signal user data, Eastern District of Virginia
quoteText: We’ve designed the Signal service to minimize the data we retain about Signal users
title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you
tosdr.tldr: The transparency report states: "We’ve designed the Signal service to minimize the data we retain about Signal users, so the only information we can produce in response to a request like this is the date and time a user registered with Signal and the last date of a user’s connectivity to the Signal service."
